page.title: 16Malmesbury Garden Centre
page.content: The garden centre is about 4yrs old.Mr Addington has owned it for 6 months. Before that it was called Garsdon Mill Nursery and was owned by the Honorable Patrick Howard.Before that it was farm land.{The Centre is about 10 acres}but a lot of it is undeveloped.They sell trees, tools,house plants,garden chemicals, peat,sheds,garden plants and shrubs. Of these the best selling items are vegetable plants and shrubs. Their customers are local and they sell directly to them from the Garden Centre.{Mr Addington}advertises on the radio,in local newspapers and by delivering leaflets.He employs 5 people.Mr Addington hopes to develop the rest of the 10 acres,to improve existing facilities and to have a pick your own farm.His only problems have been getting planning permission for signs,buildings and new roads.
